The file includes the definitons of functions which checks, if needed external dependencies are avaiable.

Function Documentation

int obrwChkExt_isFehOnSystem ( void   ) 

The function checks if extern tool 'feh' is installed (bin at /usr/bin/feh).

Returns:
The function returns 1 if feh is installed (bin at /usr/bin/feh) and 0 if it's not installed.
Return values:
1 true
0 false
